א → $alef ; # HEBREW LETTER ALEF ב → v ; # HEBREW LETTER BET ג → g ; # HEBREW LETTER GIMEL ד → d ; # HEBREW LETTER DALET ה → h ; # HEBREW LETTER HE ח → ẖ ; # HEBREW LETTER HET ו → w ; # HEBREW LETTER VAV ז → z ; # HEBREW LETTER ZAYIN [טת] → t ; # HEBREW LETTER TET י → y ; # HEBREW LETTER YOD [כך] → kh ; # HEBREW LETTER KAF and FINAL KAF ל → l ; # HEBREW LETTER LAMED [מם] → m ; # HEBREW LETTER MEM and FINAL MEM [נן] → n ; # HEBREW LETTER NUN and FINAL NUN ס → s ; # HEBREW LETTER SAMEKH ע → $ayin ; # HEBREW LETTER AYIN [פף] → f ; # HEBREW LETTER PE and FINAL PE [צץ] → ẕ ; # HEBREW LETTER TSADI and FINAL TSADI ק → q ; # HEBREW LETTER QOF ר → r ; # HEBREW LETTER RESH שׁ → sh ; # HEBREW LETTER SHIN שׂ → s ; # HEBREW LETTER SHIN
